for great shots in low light: Combining optical SteadyShot image stabilization and high ISO sensitivity which helps compensate for shaky hands, double anti-blur solution minimizes blur and allows flash free shooting to preserve the mood.

optimized for people pictures: Face detection technology detects up to eight individual faces and controls flash, focus, exposure and white balance to deliver accurate, natural skin tones with reduced red-eye.
